input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent Server Performance Issue

Dear Customer Support Team,

I am reaching out to report a critical issue regarding the IT Consulting Service provided by your company. Our client, <name>, has been experiencing inconsistent server performance during peak hours, which is impacting their business operations significantly My name is Maria Gonzalez.. They require an urgent consultation and implementation of a solution to optimize their system performance. This service is crucial for maintaining our operational efficiency and supporting our client's needs. Please prioritize this request and revert with possible solutions and a timeline for the implementation process at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.

Best regards,
<name>
<tel_num>
 You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.
